duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct strategic analysis in support of the DoD and coordinate and author finished intelligence products.
Research, evaluate, correlate, analyze, integrate, and interpret information from multiple intelligence and operational sources.
Provide all-source analytic support to collections, operations, investigations, and other defense intelligence analytic requirements.
Leverage language ability, cultural knowledge, and context in research activities and compose draft intelligence reports adhering to client's style guide.
Conduct analytic exchanges with partners to maintain communications and situational awareness of daily activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Intelligence, Criminal Justice, Political Science, History, Law Enforcement, or related field (Master’s preferred)
